author: Thomas Jefferson
message: I'm a great believer in luck and I find the harder I work, the more I have of it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Do not waste yourself in rejection, nor bark against the bad, but chant the beauty of the good.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
title: Thought of the day

author: William Saroyan
message: Good people are good because they've come to wisdom through failure. We get very little wisdom from success, you know.
title: Thought of the day
